tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dapp_statistics (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  dapp_id UUID NOT NULL,
  user_id UUID NOT NULL,
  date_created TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  total_requests INT NOT NULL,
  successful_requests INT NOT NULL,
  user_engagement_score FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE dapp_usage_statistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    dapp_name VARCHAR(100),
    usage_count INT,
    engagement_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE dapp_usage_stats (
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    dapp_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    usage_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    total_sessions INT,
    total_transactions INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, dapp_name, usage_timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_network (
    network_id INT NOT NULL,
    block_height INT NOT NULL,
    block_hash VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
    block_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    miner_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (network_id, block_height)
);

CREATE TABLE user_engagement (
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    engagement_metric VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    engagement_value FLOAT,
    engagement_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, engagement_metric, engagement_timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE dapp_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    user_address VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL,
    date_joined TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE dapp_sessions (
    session_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    session_start TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    session_end TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    session_duration INTERVAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE dapp_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE dapp_activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE dapp_sessions (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES dapp_users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dapp_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES dapp_users(user_id)
);
